metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7575 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.20.2, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 43.0.2 and Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.5.2, does not reject MD5 signatures in Server Key Exchange messages in TLS 1.2 Handshake Protocol traffic, which makes it easier for man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers by triggering a collision.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 43.0.4+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 43.0.4+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 43.0.4+build3-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

gnutls-bin - 3.3.18-1ubuntu1
guile-gnutls - 3.3.18-1ubuntu1
libgnutls-deb0-28 - 3.3.18-1ubuntu1
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.3.18-1ubuntu1
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.3.18-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmbedcrypto0 - 2.2.1-2
libmbedtls10 - 2.2.1-2
libmbedx509-0 - 2.2.1-2
No subscription required

libnss3 - 2:3.21-1ubuntu2
libnss3-1d - 2:3.21-1ubuntu2
libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.21-1ubuntu2
libnss3-tools - 2:3.21-1ubuntu2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

openjdk-8-demo - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-jamvm - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-source - 8u72-b15-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libssl1.0.0 - 1.0.2e-1ubuntu1
openssl - 1.0.2e-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

thunderbird - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '43.0.4+build3-0ubuntu1').
gnutls28 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.18-1ubuntu1').
mbedtls package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-2').
nss package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.21-1ubuntu2').
openjdk-8 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u72-b15-1').
openssl package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2e-1ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
